alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; East Bay Interior Valleys; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 5:22PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Marin, west central Contra Costa, southeastern Sonoma and eastern San Francisco Counties through 615 PM PST... At 521 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Dillon Beach, or 26 miles west of Petaluma, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Francisco, Richmond, San Rafael, Novato, San Pablo, Pinole, Mill Valley, San Anselmo, Larkspur, Corte Madera, Tiburon, Fairfax, Sausalito, Tara Hills, San Geronimo, Black Point-Green Point, Strawberry, Point Reyes Station, Kentfield and Lucas Valley-Marinwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
